item.title: Canada to impose 25% retaliatory tariffs on $21 billion worth of U.S. goods
item.description: Canada will impose 25% tariffs on more than $20 billion worth of U.S. goods in retaliation for the Trump administration's steel and aluminum duties.

item.title: China's Commerce Ministry held talks with Walmart after report on price cut demand, state media says
item.description: Chinese and American companies should "work together" to respond to U.S. "unilateral imposition of tariffs," Chinese state media said.

item.title: Trumpâ€™s 25% tariffs on steel and aluminum imports take effect, Europe retaliates
item.description: The European Union announced countermeasures targeting the U.S. after President Donald Trump's 25% tariffs on steel and aluminum imports came into eff...

item.title: Ukraine agrees to U.S.-led ceasefire plan if Russia accepts
item.description: The agreement came after more than seven hours of negotiations in Saudi Arabia between high-level American and Ukrainian delegations.

item.title: Trump meets with CEOs at Business Roundtable as market sell-off continues
item.description: Trump, a major proponent of tariffs, told the room full of business leaders that the duties he has already imposed are having a "tremendously positive...
